response.overview: Michael Krenzler (Dominic Mangle) is a man who has struggled with multiple personality disorder for most of his life. But when his friend Evan Wilson (Nathaniel Stoner) and his wife Nora Wilson (Ashleigh Sites) try to find a way to help his condition, Michael discovers it won't be long before his other personalities break free from his mind.  Psalms 55:18  STARRING: Dominic Mangle Nathaniel Stoner Ashleigh Sites Christopher Mangle  Mangle Films, 2022 Fellowship Studios, 2022
response.title: At War with Myself
